General.Name: Kyoritsu Electric Corporation
General.Description: Kyoritsu Electric Corporation offers various systems, testing and measuring instruments, etc. primarily in Japan. It provides process automation products, such as integrated production control systems, network-based control systems, and compact control systems, as well as flow, pressure, and temperature sensors; and factory automation products and services comprising Web camera monitoring systems and system integration services. The company also provides test and measurement products, including automatic optical measurement products, in-circuit testers, vibroducers, combination testers, PC-based function testers, PC-based multi meters and oscilloscopes, data acquisition systems, and digital oscilloscopes; laboratory automation products; and open network products, such as Linux and diskless servers. In addition, it offers civil automation products, which include shield and tunnel boring machine management systems; electromagnetic compatibility products; and environmental products. Kyoritsu Electric Corporation was founded in 1957 and is based in Shizuoka, Japan.
